item.title: Django Migrations Downgrade in Docker Swarm
item.description: Edge cases are a big problem in software engineering, one that I recently ran into while on a beta box was errors being thrown after a downgrade. First a little background on the application. It is a django application running in a docker container via docker-swarm. Our application upgrade/downgrade process is to reduce the amount of containers running down to 0. Change the tag numbers in our .yml file and then scale them back up.
